meanings.definition: The time during which school is in session.
meanings.sent1: During termtime, students attend classes and learn new things.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to termtime because I get to see my friends at school.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that during termtime, the students are like busy bees in a hive.
meanings.sent4: In the world of education, termtime is like the heartbeat of the school year.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of termtime fills the air as students prepare for a new semester.

meanings.definition: The period of time when specific conditions or rules apply.
meanings.sent1: During termtime, the discount is only available for a limited time.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to follow the safety rules during termtime to avoid accidents.
meanings.sent3: The sign clearly stated that during termtime, parking is only allowed for staff.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, termtime is when the new policies come into effect.
meanings.sent5: The excitement during termtime is palpable as everyone follows the set guidelines.
